name: No. 02
description:
DESCRIPTION:

You have been given the best No. 02 pencil in the world! 

Unfortunately, it's tax season...

Now you have to you have to fill out every single piece of paper that comes your way!

CONTROLS:

  • A - Hit the left side.
  • D - Hit the right side.

DIRECTIONS:

  • Whenever a paper comes close to you, destroy it with the No. 02 Pencil given!
  • If you miss an attack, you will be put into hit stun where you cannot hit.
  • You are given two lives, get the highest score you can!

This was submitted to the United Game Jam:

I believe this fits the theme due to:

  • Two controls.
  • Two lives.
  • Two screen and split.
  • and a number two pencil...
